page.title: 03INDUSTRY
page.content: Most firms are situated in the industrial estate on Haydock Lane north of the{East Lancs Road (A580)}. The first firm started there in 1950. The estate has grown slowly since 1950 and covers land which used to be farmland and miners'cottages.There are only two firms with more than 100 employees, and the average is 28. The firms import goods from New Zealand and much of Europe, and goods are distributed from Haydock all over Britain, but particularly in northwest England. Many of the firms chose Haydock as a base because it is close to good trunk roads -the{A580}and{M62} to the east and west coast ports, and close to the{M6}for north-south travel. There are a few firms on Clipsley Lane{(A599)}, the old main road through Haydock.
